title: Hospital accident prevention: how to survive the working day
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Accidents - Prevention
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Hospitals - Safety measures
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Hospitals
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Safety education, Industrial
description: A safety film on hospitals. Hospitals are unique in many aspects, and an unusual guided tour highlights the risks, risk areas and their special hazards. Safety procedures are explained and the way to avoid accidents diagnosed. Peter Sallis (portraying the safety officer) and Fred, the cartoon character explore the hospital. Fred finds out for himself that if safety rules are ignored in one deparment, innocent people in another can and do get hurt!
